: : Rodimus Prime : :
Rodimus notices that the sounds of the tape are effecting his daughter. He turns the tape off, and hold her tight. He thinks about how this place wasn't the best to raise a child. Elita didn't need to be in a warzone like earth.

: : Kup : :

Meanwhile Kup looks too Yggdrasil.

Kup: If our team is selected then lets contact them and get out there.


airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:Elita:

Elita cuddle against her dad when she heard the shots in the 
speakers of her dad's tape. It remember her a traumatic part of her 
past, altought she didn't knew exactly what had happened there. That 
sounds were like when she born... altought she could see anything of 
what was going on there. The sounds did that she remember a familiar 
scent (her mommy's scent)altought she couldn't remember at whom 
belonged it
